name: Run, Goo, Run
description:
This is a game that requires speed and punctuality.

You are in control of a cube or several cubes and your goal is to lead them to their color goals. While you do so, killer walls will constantly be trying to push you off the ledge of the platform you are on. That is why you have to develop your strategy and sometimes sacrifice time.

Get into the speed mode but don't be hasty! It just might cost you your cubes.
